org.apache.flink.runtime.operators

Class MapPartitionDriver<IT,OT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.MapPartitionDriver<IT,OT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IT - The mapper's input data type.
    OT - The mapper's output data type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PactDriver<MapPartitionFunction<IT,OT>,OT>

    public class MapPartitionDriver<IT,OT>
extends Object
implements PactDriver<MapPartitionFunction<IT,OT>,OT>
    MapPartition task which is executed by a Nephele task manager. The task has a single input and one or multiple outputs. It is provided with a MapFunction implementation.

    The MapPartitionTask creates an iterator over all key-value pairs of its input and hands that to the map_partition() method of the MapFunction.

    See Also:
    MapPartitionFunction

      • run

        public void run()
         throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: PactDriver
        The main operation method of the task. It should call the user code with the data subsets until the input is depleted.
        Specified by:
        run in interface PactDriver<MapPartitionFunction<IT,OT>,OT>
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception thrown by this method signals task failure. Because exceptions in the user code typically signal situations where this instance in unable to proceed, exceptions from the user code should be forwarded.
